name: User Story (English)
description: User stories describe the requirements for a system from the user's perspective. This template is designed for the English language.

role.name: Role
role.explanation: Describes the role of the user who is making the requirement.

goal.name: Goal
goal.explanation: Describes the goal the user wants to achieve.

benefit.name: Benefit
benefit.explanation: Describes the benefit the user gets from achieving the goal.

user-story.name: User Story
user-story.description: A user story describes a requirement from the user's perspective.
user-story.format: As a <role> I want <goal>, so that <benefit>.
user-story.example: As a user I want to check a requirement with the tool, so that I can improve quality.
